sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RestrictCapabilityAccess</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RestrictCapabilityAccess</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RestrictCapabilityAccess = Class.create();
RestrictCapabilityAccess.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    isFeatureMappingAccessible: function(sysId) {
        if (!sysId)
            return true;
        var genAiFeatureMappingGr = new GlideRecord('sys_gen_ai_feature_mapping');
        genAiFeatureMappingGr.addActiveQuery();
	genAiFeatureMappingGr.addEncodedQuery('customer_updatable=false^ORcustomer_updatableISEMPTY');
        genAiFeatureMappingGr.addQuery('document', sysId);
        genAiFeatureMappingGr.query();
        if (genAiFeatureMappingGr.next()) {
            return false;
        }
        return true;

    },

    isCapabilityDefinitionAccessible: function(definitionId) {
        var definitionGr = new GlideRecord('sys_one_extend_capability_definition');
        definitionGr.addQuery('sys_id', definitionId);
        definitionGr.query();
        if (definitionGr.next()) {
            return this.isFeatureMappingAccessible(definitionGr.getValue('capability'));
        }
        return true;
    },

    type: 'RestrictCapabilityAccess'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-08 08:53:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>065741d7538131104ea9ddeeff7b12dd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RestrictCapabilityAccess</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_065741d7538131104ea9ddeeff7b12dd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-12-06 04:20:32</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
